title: Prescription Drug Prices, Part 1
description: The House Energy and Commerce Subcommittee on Health held a hearing to examine high prescription drug prices. In the first panel, lawmakers heard from pharmaceutical companies Pfizer, Amgen and Exelixis and pharmacy benefit managers (PBMs) Express Scripts and Navitus Health Solutions.
